channel.title: Graphs on Dominic Royé
channel.description: Recent content in Graphs on Dominic Royé

item.title: Climate and Weather
item.description: Probability of a frost day (minimum temperature less than 0ºC) through the year in Europe. Data: E-OBS 18e. Probability of a frost day (minimum temperature less than 0ºC/32ºF) through the year in the Contiguous United States. Data: PRISM. Platform: Google Earth Engine. Winter anomalies of temperature and precipitation in Bilbao. Data: ECA&D Winter anomalies of temperature and precipitation in Zaragoza. Data: ECA&D Winter anomalies of temperature and precipitation in Santander.

item.title: Environment
item.description: Light pollution by municipality in 2015. What is the municipality that emits the most artificial light? The map shows the Coefficient of Variation (standard deviation/mean) of each municipalities. Data: VIIRS Nighttime Lights NOAA (2015). Which coast has more light pollution in Peninsular Spain? The coast margins include a buffer of 5km. Data: VIIRS Nighttime Lights NOAA (2016). Light pollution by municipality in 2015. What is the municipality that emits the most artificial light?

item.title: Geography
item.description: Travel time to high-density urban centers via surface transport in Spain. Data: resourcewatch.org. Ranking of travel time to high-density urban centers via surface transport by Spanish Provinces. Data: resourcewatch.org. Inspired by the great work of @geo_coe I have created an elevation map for the meandering river Ebro, middle section between Logroño and Zaragoza in Spain. Data: DEM05 (Modelo Digital del Terreno - MDT05). Inspired by the great work of @geo_coe I have created an elevation map for the meandering river Alagón, right tributary to the Tagus in Spain.

item.title: Health
item.description: Evolution of adult obesity in Europe between 1975 and 2016. Data: ourwoldindata, script. National Overdose Death in the US by different drugs since 1999, showing a horrifying trend. Data: ourwoldindata.

item.title: Population
item.description: Population pyramid of Galicia since 1975. Data: IGE Population pyramid of Galician provinces since 1975. Data: IGE Population pyramid of Spanish autonomous community since 1998. Data: INE Migration flows between Spanish autonomous communities in 2008. Data: INE
